sentences.en: An unhappy duckling grows into a beautiful swan in this magical fairytale.
sentences.cn: 一只丑小鸭经历了种种凄苦的遭遇,最后变成一只美丽的天鹅!

sentences.en: Geese: Who are you? You're an ugly duckling. Well, we're leaving. Good - bye !
sentences.cn: 鹅: 你是谁? 你是一只丑鸭子. 好了, 我们要走了. 再见!

sentences.en: He's got the looks of a film star now, but he was a real ugly duckling as a child.
sentences.cn: 他现在一副电影明星的模样, 小时候他可真是只丑小鸭.

sentences.en: Like the duckling in his story, he never fit in.
sentences.cn: 就像他故事里的丑小鸭一般, 他从未被人接纳.

sentences.en: Mary was the ugly duckling in her family until she grew up.
sentences.cn: 玛丽在家中是个丑小鸭.直到长大后才变好看.

sentences.en: My dear " duckling ", do you still embed in mind the dream of " white swan "?
sentences.cn: 亲爱的 “ 小鸭子 ”, 还在做 “ 白天鹅 ” 的梦 吗 ?

sentences.en: Oh, kill me!" said the poor duckling, and he waited for his death bowing his head towards the water.
sentences.cn: 可怜的小鸭说着朝水中低头，等待死亡的来临。 但他在清澈的水中看到什么样了呢？

sentences.en: She was a shy, ugly duckling of a child.
sentences.cn: 她小时候是个羞怯的丑小鸭。
就这样这只小鸭离开了。

sentences.en: That beauty once was an ugly duckling.
sentences.cn: 那美女以前是个丑小鸭.

sentences.en: The diminutive suffix - ling in " duckling " denotes affection.
sentences.cn: "duckling " (小鸭子)中意指"小"的字尾-ling表示亲昵.

sentences.en: The duckling becomes independent soon after it emerges from its shell.
sentences.cn: 雏鸭出壳后很快就能独立生活.

sentences.en: The duckling spends the winter at the farmer's house.
sentences.cn: 丑小鸭就在农夫家里度过了冬天.

sentences.en: The farmer takes the duckling to a pond behind his house.
sentences.cn: 农夫带着丑小鸭来到他家后面的池塘.

sentences.en: The poor duckling was chased and harassed by all the ducklings because he was very ugly.
sentences.cn: 这只可怜的小鸭被所有的小鸭追逐和骚扰，因为他长得很丑。

sentences.en: The story of The Ugly Duckling is known by almost every child.
sentences.cn: 由于家境贫困,他刚出生就被出继给别人.

sentences.en: These are not people you are the epitome of an ugly duckling?
sentences.cn: 这些名人们不都是丑小鸭的缩影 吗 ?

sentences.en: We're going to feed the duckling.

words.tran_cn: 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分

phrases.tran_cn: 丑小鸭；小时难看长大后变得才貌出众的人

trans.tran_cn: 小鸭，幼鸭，丑小鸭（初似平庸后来出众的人或事物）
